page.title: 02Romiley,Bredbury and Woodley
page.content: Romiley is a busy village with a large shopping precinct at the heart. With shops ranging from D.I.Y.to sport and leisure ,and from shoe shops to electronics ,a lot of people shop here from all over Romiley,Bredbury and Woodley.Entertainment and leisure are quite easy to find. There are tennis courts,bowling greens and a cricket club.There are also several clubs including the Conservative and Liberal clubs.Woodley main street has a larger precinct than Romiley and old people's flats opposite with a zebra crossing between them.Directly ahead is St.Mark's church.Woodley is more industrial than Romiley and has less countryside.There is also a pub called the Lowes Arms near the church.Bredbury main street is called Bents Lane.There are many small shops and an old slaughterhouse.
